trends: There have been no other sightings in Central Saanich
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: slowly descending object. appears to be glowing or 'burning up'. Seen in the early morning hours looking east over the ocean.
divs: sighting detailsa friend video taped a few minutes of an object appearing to slowly descend in the distance. it appears very large and potentially 'burning up' in the atmosphere or glowing. none of us have seen anything like it and are curious if you are perhaps curious as well. i have the two videos on my facebook page right now and might be able to get you a youtube link or the files themselves (if its of interest). i am no the observer or recorder of these events. i am simply making the first step in communicating this with you to see if there is a logical next step in trying to figure out what this is\was. thank you for your time and consideration. steven
